thread.title: Rishi Kapoor to make special appearance in 'Chalk n Duster'
thread.title_full: Rishi Kapoor to make special appearance in 'Chalk n Duster' - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Rishi Kapoor to make special appearance in 'Chalk n Duster'
text:
Veteran actor Rishi Kapoor will be doing a cameo in upcoming film 'Chalk n Duster', starring Shabana Azmi.

Rishi Kapoor 
Shabana, who stars in the Jayant Gilatar directorial alongside Divya Dutta and Juhi Chawla, said he requested the "Bobby" actor to appear in the movie.
"Welcome @chintskap (Rishi Kapoor) to #Chalk And Duster and a million thanks for so generously agreeing to doing a guest appearance at my request. Respect," she posted on Twitter.
The film also stars Jackie Shroff, Samir Soni and Girish Karnad.
